text: I uh was uh born in the Bronx and I
lived there for the first seven years of
my life um it was Katona Park East we
were on the park side and uh at age
seven because of the
depression uh was 19 31 my father had
lost his job and uh a job was offered to
him by my mother's brother if we came to
Newark in New Jersey and so we moved to
New Jersey and I lived there for the
next 10 years of my life and then in
1941 we relocated uh to New York City in
Brooklyn Ocean
Parkway um
and it was a nice life we were poor like
all poor people in those days we didn't
know we were
poor uh and we got along
and uh the areas that I lived in were
like 100% Jewish so I thought the whole
world was
Jewish I have lived in Manhattan uh the
uh Bronx Brooklyn and uh the other two
have yet uh
to get me there but sooner or later it's
possible
